name: American Dad! Pinball
summary:
In American Dad! Pinball, you’ll explore the Smith family residence and Roger's Place in a frantic mini-playfield, bullseye shots with Stan at the Fun N' Gun Shooting range in a first-person mini-game, assume Roger's various Personas in different game modes, and manipulate the National Threat Level, changing the way missions will play out!

The American Dad Pinball app also offers up a robust set of features for pinball fans, including unique achievements and statistics, online scoreboards, and hotseat multiplayer to let you compete your friends.
